items.title: LG's OLED TVs get certified as the contrast king even over RGB TV tech in tests, though we have some questions — including why LG says this makes them 'the optimal choice in the AI era'
items.title_en: LG's OLED TVs get certified as the contrast king even over RGB TV tech in tests, though we have some questions — including why LG says this makes them 'the optimal choice in the AI era'
items.title_zh: LG 的 OLED 电视在测试中获得了对比度之王的认证，甚至超过了 RGB 电视技术，尽管我们有一些疑问 - 包括为什么 LG 说这使它们成为“人工智能时代的最佳选择”
